article: On Sundays, Li Lei gets up at six thirty. He has _ at eight. Then he helps his mother _ the housework. At ten he leaves _ and goes shopping by bike . At about eleven o'clock he comes _ home. He is cooking now. They have lunch at twelve. In the afternoon he often plays games with his friends. They have _ at six thirty. In the evening he does his homework. Sometimes, he watches TV. He goes to bed at nine.
